items.sentence: Tom noticed Mary\'s car parked in front of the library.
Tom is one of the most interesting guys I\'ve ever met.
Tom was able to find Mary\'s house without any problem.
Tom told Mary he couldn\'t do what she asked him to do.
Tom and I are the only ones who don\'t want to be here.
Mary isn\'t just my sister. She\'s my best friend, too.
Tom\'s chauffeur opened the limousine\'s door for Mary.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who got up early this morning.
Tom wished he\'d never stepped foot into Mary\'s house.
You know Tom can\'t speak French very well, don\'t you?
